Infidelity & Domestic Investigations

Discreet and compassionate investigations for individuals seeking clarity in personal relationships. We provide thorough surveillance, documentation, and evidence gathering while maintaining the highest level of confidentiality.

When You Need to Know the Truth

Suspecting infidelity is emotionally difficult. If you're questioning your partner's faithfulness, you deserve answers. For nearly 30 years, individuals throughout Park City, Summit County, and the Mountain West have trusted MILLERGROUP Intelligence to help them uncover the truth with discretion and compassion.

Our experienced investigators understand the sensitive nature of relationship investigations. We provide clear, documented evidence while protecting your privacy every step of the way.

Our Investigation Services

Discreet Surveillance

We conduct professional surveillance operations using proven techniques and advanced technology. Our investigators are trained to remain undetected while documenting activities, movements, and interactions that may concern you.

Photographic & Video Documentation

We provide clear visual evidence through time-stamped photographs and video recordings. All documentation is conducted legally and ethically, ensuring it can be used if needed in legal proceedings.

Activity Reports

You'll receive detailed written reports documenting dates, times, locations, and observed activities. Our reports are thorough, objective, and presented in a professional format.

Background Research

When appropriate, we conduct background checks and research to provide additional context about individuals involved in your case. This may include social media analysis, public records searches, and other investigative techniques.

Our Commitment to You

Complete Confidentiality

Your privacy is sacred. We maintain strict confidentiality throughout the investigation process. Your case is handled with the utmost discretion, and we never share information with anyone except you.

Compassionate Approach

We understand this is a difficult time. Our investigators approach every case with empathy and professionalism, providing support while delivering the facts you need to make informed decisions about your relationship.

Local Expertise

Based in Park City with deep knowledge of Summit County and surrounding Mountain West communities, we understand the local environment and can conduct investigations effectively throughout Utah, California, and Montana.

Licensed & Experienced

Our investigators are fully licensed with over 30 years of combined experience. We use proven investigative methods and maintain the highest professional standards.

What to Expect

Free Consultation: We begin with a confidential conversation to understand your situation and concerns. We'll explain how we can help and what you can expect from the investigation process.

Customized Strategy: Every case is different. We develop an investigation plan tailored to your specific circumstances, timeline, and budget.

Regular Updates: You'll receive updates throughout the investigation, keeping you informed without compromising operational security.

Final Report: Upon completion, you'll receive a comprehensive report with all findings, photographic evidence, and documentation in a professional format.

Ready to Find Answers?

Taking this first step requires courage. We're here to help you move forward with clarity and confidence.
